name: FloodChamber
description:
FloodChamber is a 2D Puzzle Platformer, set in the submerged ruins of an ancient civilisation, where players must dive beneath the water and solve puzzles to unlock their secrets, and make it back to the surface… What might you find down there, hidden behind locked doors that no human has touched for thousands of years?

Walk, clamber, and swim through hidden passages and tunnels; explore air-filled chambers with light platforming, or completely submerged environments where you'll manage your oxygen supply and evade creatures in the depths.

Created by From the Depths, a group of University of Canterbury students for PROD121 2022.

From the Depths team:
Kris Sian - Programming, Level Design
Emma Davis -Programming, Sound, Level Design
Ruiha Reuben -Art and Animation
Danielle McKenzie - Level Design
Harry Ward - Art and Animation
